import React, { Component, Fragment, useState } from "react"; import 'react-notifications/lib/notifications.css'; import { NotificationContainer, NotificationManager } from 'react-notifications'; import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { graphql } from 'react-apollo'; import { Mutation } from "react-apollo"; import queries from 'queries/Empresas.jsx'; import { AvForm, AvField } from 'availity-reactstrap-validation'; import {createNotification} from "components/notifications/notifications.jsx" import { gql } from 'apollo-boost' class Formuser extends React.Component { render() { const { nombre, usuario, correo, provincia, canton, distrito }= this.props.datos; const onChange = this.props.onChange; const query=gql`${this.props.query}`; const Id=this.props.datos.Id===undefined ? 1 : this.props.datos.Id; debugger return ( <>
{this.props.title}
 {postEmpresa => } ); } } export default graphql(queries.addEmpresas)(Formuser);
